text.text_translated: Erik Weihenmayer is an American adventurer. He has been blind since he was 13. He has ridden a bike across the deserts of Morocco, kayaked in the Grand Canyon and climbed Everest. He also encourages people with disabilities to lead active lives. He leads groups of young blind people on climbing expeditions.
